title: Problems with Riot Art
body:
Hey all,
I just want to ask you guys how I can upload my saved art for earning some rp from Riot? I really want this nicu skin :(

replies.body:
Then you can submit a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new  since this is an account related action.

Make sure to select “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and category “Games and Features > General Questions”.

you can then write your request in the "Description" box provided and right beneath that there is a space you can click on to upload  your image/art file.

Good luck {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

If you're short a smaller amount of RP and you just need a little boost to get you to that new skin, just like Fulbau said reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can see what we might be able to do!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
